name: RadioRoot
description: Root component of Radio that renders a circular radio button. Renders a `<button>` element.

props.name: className
props.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

props.name: inputRef
props.description: A ref to access the hidden input element.

props.name: nativeButton
props.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `true` if the rendered element is a native button.

props.name: readOnly
props.description: Whether the user should be unable to select the radio button.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: required
props.description: Whether the user must choose a value before submitting a form.

props.name: value
props.description: The unique identifying value of the radio in a group.

props.name: invalid
props.description: Determines whether the radio button is in an invalid state.

props.name: size
props.description: Determines the size of the radio button.
